nodes.text: Iltarr City was a city on the planet Wukkar, and the location of the Marblewood Estate, the home of Black Sun Sector Chief Avrak Villachor. It was policed by the Iltarr City police. Rachele Ree was a member of the Wukkar aristocracy who was very familiar with the city and its citizens. Iltarr City was said to have the best Corellian food on the planet.
